ArticleActivity 分享 Archive Content Please wait Loading 首页 Manage Feeds Other Extra 设置 关于 Chris 收藏夹 Remove 从收藏夹中移除这篇内容？ 移除 管理RSS源 编辑RSS源 编辑 删除 设置 筛选 Sort feeds

类别

个性化设置

Article 文章字体 设置文章字体大小 perf_article_font_size

小 中 大
Enable Feeds Animation If disabled, feeds won\'t animate, this might reduce lag If enabled, feeds will animate, this might generate lag perf_feeds_anim_key
Enable Sources Animation If disabled, sources won\'t animate, this might reduce lag If enabled, sources will animate, this might generate lag perf_sources_anim_key
启用圆形显示动画 如果禁用，则不会在添加源的界面上看到循环显示动画。 如果启用，您将在添加源的界面上看到圆形显示动画。 perf_circular_reveal_key
Curated Feeds
Import Curated feeds Import some of the best Rss feed sources available over the internet perf_curated_feeds_import_key
Submit Curated feeds Submit your own Rss feed sources and help in improving the current curated list perf_curated_feeds_submit_key
个性主题 切换系统主题 perf_theme Light user
白天模式
夜间模式
Light
Dark
启用应用程序浏览器 如果禁用，应用程序将通过外部浏览器打开源链接。 如果启用，应用程序将通过内部浏览器打开源链接。 perf_in_app_browser_key
Import Opml files Import custom feed sources from Opml files, either from a url or a file perf_import_opml_files Light
From url
From file
From url
From file
启用缓存 如果禁用，应用程序不会将数据存入数据库。 如果启用，应用程序会将数据存入数据库。 perf_feeds_cache
系统设置 重置数据库 将数据库恢复到初始状态 这将删除数据库中的所有数据，包括您的档案和已添加RSS源
Miscellaneous
Feeds not working? Not every Rss source will work correctly with the app, so inorder to make it work you need to modify your feeds. Tap here to view the tutorial perf_feeds_not_working_key
下拉刷新页面 你还没有收藏东西呢 在浏览器中打开 刷新 没有网络可用 无法检测到Internet连接。请在网络设置中打开它。 设置 忽略 这将会清空当前主页面的所有内容。但是不会重置你的收藏夹。 清空 没有可用的内容 SplashActivity Hello World from section: %1$d Chris 阅读RSS源更加简单 管理, 收藏以及分享你的RSS源 一个简单的RSS阅读器 通过提要快速选择你想阅读的内容 可以添加你自己的RSS源，管理它们，并阅读与提要相关联的文章。
关于 Chris Created BY\nLana Contact the developer

Enter Url Url Enter url here Get feeds Select Feeds Import Change Log Version 1.0\n\nFixed some issues with feed parsing, thanks to https://github.com/LukeOwncloud\n\nVersion 0.43\n\nMinor bug fixes.\n\nVersion 0.42\n\nMinor bug fixes.\n\nVersion 0.41\n\nMinor bug fixes.\n\nVersion 0.40\n\nAdded sync feature. Now you can synchronize feeds in background and application will save all of the data for offline reading.\n\nVersion 0.33\n\nAdded white icons in dark theme(only in category list and sources list) so they are easier to see.\n\nRemoved shadow from toolbars as it was glitching in dark theme.\n\nVersion 0.32\n\nMinor bug fixes.\n\nAdded shadow to toolbars.\n\nAdded option to delete the feed from article.\n\nVersion 0.31\n\nMinor bug fix, which was making the settings menu crash on some devices.\n\nVersion 0.30\n\nAdded Opml integration.\n\nAdded Read External Storage permission so that user can import opml feeds via file stored in SD Card or internal storage.\n\nAdded Curated feeds and option to submit your own feeds to the curated list.\n\nAdded Sorting option, now user can sort the feeds by random, title, category and date.\n\nMinor bug fixes.\n\nVersion 0.22\n\nMade circular reveal animation optional, you can disable it in settings.\n\nVersion 0.21\n\nFixed a bug in which white screen was shown on splash screen.\n\nAdded the option to rate, view source code and view licence in About screen.\n\nVersion 0.20\n\nAdded dark theme.\n\nVersion 0.11\n\nRemoved duplicate entries in settings menu.\n\nVersion 0.10\n\nReleased initial version. Delete 该操作将从主界面永久的删除这篇内容！ Syncing feeds 同步 Feeds synced Downloading feeds - Chris Download complete - Chris Contributions These people contributed in the development of this app. You reap what you sow.
